name: tootik
description: Tootik is a self-hosted microblogging platform implementing ActivityPub, enabling federated social networking. It provides timelines, posts, and interactions via a simple, lightweight web UI.
features: ActivityPub federation: Connect with Mastodon, Pleroma, and other federated social networks using ActivityPub protocol.
Microblogging: Post short updates, thoughts, and content to share with followers across the fediverse.
Timeline views: Browse home, local, and federated timelines to discover content and conversations.
Interactions: Like, boost, and reply to posts from users on your instance and across federated servers.
Following: Follow users from any compatible instance to see their posts in your timeline.
Lightweight: Run efficiently with minimal resource requirements suitable for personal or small community instances.
Web interface: Access your social network through a simple, straightforward web interface.
Privacy controls: Control post visibility with public, unlisted, followers-only, or direct message options.
Media support: Share images and other media files with posts for richer content sharing.
Notifications: Receive notifications for mentions, follows, and interactions with your content.
Search: Find users and posts across your instance and the federated network.
Profile customization: Set up your profile with bio, avatar, and header image to express your identity.
